title: Designing Self-Directed Mathematics Instruction for OER Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing OER-based competencies for workplace-integrated mathematics training for employees.

learning_goals: Apply OER platform criteria for searching and evaluating mathematics educational materials, meeting at least 80% of the standards
Analyze the perceived ease of use (PEOU) and perceived usefulness (PU) of OER tools based on the TAM model and incorporate findings into instructional design
Design OER-based mathematics learning activities to improve learner self-efficacy (SE) by at least 70%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
